tigercontrol.methods package¶

core¶

Method

control¶

tigercontrol.methods.control.ControlMethod() Description: class for implementing algorithms with enforced modularity
tigercontrol.methods.control.KalmanFilter() Description: Kalman Filter adjusts measurements of a signal based on prior states and knowledge of intrinsic equations of the system.
tigercontrol.methods.control.ODEShootingMethod() Description: Implements the shooting method to solve second order boundary value problems with conditions y(0) = a and y(L) = b.
tigercontrol.methods.control.LQR() Description: Computes optimal set of actions using the Linear Quadratic Regulator algorithm.
tigercontrol.methods.control.MPPI() Description: Implements Method Predictive Path Integral Control to compute optimal control sequence.
tigercontrol.methods.control.CartPoleNN() Description: Simple multi-layer perceptron policy, no internal state
tigercontrol.methods.control.ILQR() Description: Computes optimal set of actions using the Linear Quadratic Regulator algorithm.

time_series¶

tigercontrol.methods.time_series.TimeSeriesMethod() Description: class for implementing algorithms with enforced modularity
tigercontrol.methods.time_series.AutoRegressor() Description: Implements the equivalent of an AR(p) method - predicts a linear combination of the previous p observed values in a time-series
tigercontrol.methods.time_series.LastValue() Description: Predicts the last value in the time series, i.e.
tigercontrol.methods.time_series.PredictZero() Description: Predicts the next value in the time series to be 0, i.e.
tigercontrol.methods.time_series.RNN() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized recurrent neural network.
tigercontrol.methods.time_series.LSTM() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized LSTM neural network.
tigercontrol.methods.time_series.LeastSquares() Description: Implements online least squares.

optimizers¶

tigercontrol.methods.optimizers.Optimizer([…]) Description: Core class for method optimizers
tigercontrol.methods.optimizers.Adagrad([…]) Description: Ordinary Gradient Descent optimizer.
tigercontrol.methods.optimizers.Adam([pred, …]) Description: Ordinary Gradient Descent optimizer.
tigercontrol.methods.optimizers.ONS([pred, …]) Online newton step algorithm.
tigercontrol.methods.optimizers.SGD([pred, …]) Description: Stochastic Gradient Descent optimizer.
tigercontrol.methods.optimizers.OGD([pred, …]) Description: Ordinary Gradient Descent optimizer.
tigercontrol.methods.optimizers.mse(y_pred, …) Description: mean-square-error loss :param y_pred: value predicted by method :param y_true: ground truth value :param eps: some scalar
tigercontrol.methods.optimizers.cross_entropy(…) Description: cross entropy loss, y_pred is equivalent to logits and y_true to labels :param y_pred: value predicted by method :param y_true: ground truth value :param eps: some scalar

boosting¶

tigercontrol.methods.boosting.SimpleBoost() Description: Implements the equivalent of an AR(p) method - predicts a linear combination of the previous p observed values in a time-series
